# [Intents on the Extended UTxO Ledger](https://api.zotero.org/groups/478201/items/KWD8QJWK/file/view?key=PnpP8O1NApZMMF0LVNh7I4I5)

August/2024, WiFM Workshop

UTXOINTENTS

The extended (i.e. smart contract-enabled) UTxO cryptocurrency ledger comes with strong formal guarantees. However, this comes at the cost of inflexibility of specification of what a transaction does to the ledger state. We discuss a kind of application procedure for partially valid transactions, called "intent processing", to address this inflexibility but maintain certain formal guarantees.
